mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (PRODUCT_ID, USER_ID_NO, REVIEW_CONTENTS) VALUES (#{productId}, #{userIdNo}, #{reviewContents})
mapper.select: SELECT REVIEW_ID FROM review WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo} AND PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
SELECT r.REVIEW_ID, u.USER_NAME, r.REVIEW_CONTENTS, r.REVIEW_CREATED_AT FROM review r JOIN user u ON r.USER_ID_NO = u.USER_ID_NO WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET REVIEW_CONTENTS = #{updateContents} WHERE USER_ID_NO = #{userIdNo}
